name: tm77
effect: Teaches Psych Up to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Psych Up to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the foe.
flavor_text.platinum: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the foe.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the foe.
